imdb.plot outline: Mired in debt and other middle-class disasters, an emotionally moth-eaten, forty-something NYC writer, her unemployed husband, and his disabled brother cut and run for greener pastures in "fairy-tale" small-town Station Stop, Virginia, only to accidentally find themselves living on an old farm in the sticks of Virginia, in a town called Chicken, instead.
imdb.title: Farm Story
plot: Mired in debt and other middle-class disasters, an emotionally moth-eaten, forty-something NYC writer, her unemployed husband, and his disabled brother cut and run for greener pastures in "fairy-tale" small-town Station Stop, Virginia, only to accidentally find themselves living on an old farm in the sticks of Virginia, in a town called Chicken, instead.::Terri Viani

FARM STORY is a forty-something coming-of-age drama about an emotionally moth-eaten New York City writer named Sam, who heads south with her unemployed husband Andy, and his disabled brother Kyle, for a lifestyle "do-over" in prosperous, artsy, small-town Station Stop, VA; but the trio's plans for shiny new lives rapidly de-rail when they accidentally find themselves living on a dusty old farm in a quirky rural town called Chicken, VA, instead.
